name: Paint Bug
description:
>> ludum dare page <<

"Paint Bug fills you with childlike joy as you create digital art"
- Amanda Hudgins, Kill Screen

Paint Bug is a lively painting game where creatures help you create works of art. Use your mouse to grab a creature and drag them across the canvas to release their painting powers.

Click the icons below the canvas to:

✺ save a timelapse of your progress
❒ save the canvas image
◎ save a screenshot of everything
||| open your gallery folder

pro tip: holding space lifts the creature so that it doesn't paint - use this to reach the middle of the canvas before painting

Post your images to a shared gallery on twitter with #paintbug

Controls:

SPACE - Hold to lift creature
ESC - Quit
F11 - Fullscreen
M - Mute sound

F1 - Save timelapse
F2 - Save canvas
F3 - Save screenshot
F4 - Gallery

A game by:

Paloma Dawkins @palomadawkins
Kira Boom @snowkittykira
Peter Rockwell @prockwell
Cody Walker @bhane

The first version of this game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 35 jam.
